title: Document Stats
overviewMarkdown:
## Document Stats Plugin

Fast, local analysis of a block of text. Returns counts only (no original text).

Reports: Words, Sentences, Complex Sentences, Paragraphs, Estimated Pages (configurable words/page), Flesch Reading Ease (0‚Äì100).

If no `text` parameter is provided, the plugin analyzes the last user message (requires permission).

Complex sentence heuristic: sentence containing a comma, semicolon, or coordinating/subordinating conjunction (and, but, or, nor, for, so, yet, because, although, since, while, if, unless, when, where, whereas).

All processing is client-side; no network calls.

openaiSpec.name: document_stats
openaiSpec.description: Compute document statistics (words, sentences, complex sentences, paragraphs, avg words/sentence, avg syllables/word, estimated pages, optional readability) from provided text or last user message without returning the original text.

text.description: (Optional) Text to analyze. If omitted, plugin will attempt to use the last user message's text content.

include_json.description: If true, add a raw JSON card regardless of user setting.

userSettings.name: enable_readability
userSettings.label: Compute Readability
userSettings.description: Toggle Flesch Reading Ease calculation (skip for very large texts).

userSettings.name: return_json_card
userSettings.label: Add Raw JSON Card
userSettings.description: When 'Yes', include a second card containing raw JSON of the stats.
